issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: # This is being done due to the review comments from HDFS-12486 jira and also as now changed scope of method getConfValue(String defaultValue, String keySuffix, Configuration conf, String... keys)  to public. (As these methods are internally used by hadoop project, limiting it's scope)
fields.summary: Change the Scope of the Class DFSUtilClient to Private

+1. Thank you for the contribution. I have committed this to the trunk.
There are 2 checkstyle warnings, but neither of them are really due to this change.
One is saying that we should have a comment for that class and another is about the ctor
visibility.  This is just FYI
Thank You [~anu] for committing the patch.

SUCCESS: Integrated in Jenkins build Hadoop-trunk-Commit #12957 (See [https://builds.apache.org/job/Hadoop-trunk-Commit/12957/])
